Name: azure_active-timer-count_average;azure_active-timer-count_count;azure_active-timer-count_maximum;azure_active-timer-count_minimum;azure_active-timer-count_total

Description: % time the process has utilized the CPU

Name: azure_current-requests_average;azure_current-requests_count;azure_current-requests_maximum;azure_current-requests_minimum;azure_current-requests_total
